sqlMap.select: SELECT DISTINCT CounterCode FROM IF_Offers WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BrandCode = #brandCode# AND SynchFlag IS NULL
SELECT CounterCode,CounterNameIF FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo WHERE BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE A SET A.SynchFlag = '1', A.SynchTime = GETDATE() FROM IF_Offers A WHERE A.BrandCode = #brandCode# AND A.SynchFlag IS NULL
UPDATE A SET A.SynchFlag = '2', A.SynchTime = GETDATE() FROM IF_Offers A WHERE A.IdentityID = #IdentityID# AND A.SynchFlag = '1'
UPDATE A SET A.SynchFlag = '3', A.SynchTime = GETDATE() FROM IF_Offers A WHERE A.IdentityID = #IdentityID# AND A.SynchFlag = '1'
sqlMap.select: SELECT TOP (#batchSize#) A.IdentityID, A.BrandCode, A.CounterCode, A.StartDate, A.EndDate, A.IFProductId, A.UnitCode, A.BarCode, A.ProductName, A.SalePrice, A.MemPrice, A.MemPrice2 FROM [dbo].[IF_Offers] A WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[IF_Offers] B WHERE B.BrandCode = A.BrandCode AND B.IFProductId = A.IFProductId AND B.CounterCode = A.CounterCode AND B.PuttingTime > A.PuttingTime ) AND A.BrandCode = #brandCode# AND A.SynchFlag ='1'
SELECT BIN_ProductID FROM Basis.BIN_Product WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND ItemCode = #IFProductId#

MERGE Basis.BIN_ProductSpecialOfferSoluDetail AS TGT USING (select #BIN_ProductSpecialOfferSoluID# as BIN_ProductSpecialOfferSoluID, #BIN_ProductID# as BIN_ProductID, #StartDate# AS StartDate, #EndDate# AS EndDate ) AS SRC ON ( TGT.BIN_ProductSpecialOfferSoluID = SRC.BIN_ProductSpecialOfferSoluID AND TGT.BIN_ProductID = SRC.BIN_ProductID AND TGT.SpecialOfferStartDate = SRC.StartDate AND TGT.SpecialOfferEndDate = SRC.EndDate ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET SoluProductName = #ProductName#, SpecialOfferSalePrice = #SalePrice#, SpecialOfferMemPrice = #MemPrice#, SpecialOfferPlatinumPrice = #MemPrice2#,
SpecialOfferStartDate = #StartDate#, SpecialOfferEndDate = #EndDate#,
Version = #pdTVersion# + 1,
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT( BIN_ProductSpecialOfferSoluID, BIN_ProductID, SoluProductName,
SpecialOfferSalePrice, SpecialOfferMemPrice, SpecialOfferPlatinumPrice,
SpecialOfferStartDate, SpecialOfferEndDate,
Version,
)VALUES( #BIN_ProductSpecialOfferSoluID#, #BIN_ProductID#, #ProductName#,
#SalePrice#, #MemPrice#, #MemPrice2#,
#StartDate#, #EndDate#,
#pdTVersion# + 1,
) OUTPUT $$action AS actionResult,inserted.BIN_ProductSpecialOfferSoluDetailID AS BIN_ProductSpecialOfferSoluDetailID,inserted.BIN_ProductID AS BIN_ProductID;

SELECT TOP (#batchSize#) JFH.UnionIndex FROM Tools.BIN_JobRunFaildHistory JFH WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE JFH.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND JFH.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND JFH.JobCode = #JobCode#
JFH.UnionIndex > #bathLastIFProductId#
ORDER BY JFH.UnionIndex

SELECT IP.BrandCode, IP.IFProductId, IP.Mode, IP.Grade, IP.SecQty, IP.DisplayQty, IP.OriginalBrand, IP.UnitCode, IP.BarCode, IP.ProductNameCN, IP.SalePrice, IP.CostPrice, IP.MemPrice, IP.MemPrice2, IP.ValidFlag, IP.StockFlag, IP.isExchanged,
IP.SaleFlag, IP.StockTakingFlag, IP.OrderFlag, IP.ReturnFlag, IP.Spec, IP.Color,
IP.ClassCode1, IP.ClassName1, IP.ClassCode2, IP.ClassName2, IP.ClassCode3, IP.ClassName3, IP.ClassCode4, IP.ClassName4, IP.ClassCode5, IP.ClassName5,
IP.PuttingTime, IP.SynchFlag, IP.SynchMsg, IP.SynchTime
FROM IF_Product IP WHERE IP.BrandCode = #brandCode#
IFProductId IN
#jobRunFaildHistoryList[]#
ORDER BY PuttingTime,IFProductId
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO Interfaces.BIN_StandardProductImportHis ( BrandCode, IFProductId, Mode, Grade, SecQty, DisplayQty, OriginalBrand, UnitCode, BarCode, ProductNameCN, SalePrice, CostPrice, MemPrice, MemPrice2, ValidFlag, StockFlag, isExchanged,
SaleFlag, StockTakingFlag, OrderFlag, ReturnFlag, Spec, Color,
ClassCode1, ClassName1, ClassCode2, ClassName2, ClassCode3, ClassName3, ClassCode4, ClassName4, ClassCode5, ClassName5,
PuttingTime, SynchFlag, SynchMsg, SynchTime, BackupDate ) VALUES ( #BrandCode#, #IFProductId#, #Mode#, #Grade#, #SecQty#, #DisplayQty#, #OriginalBrand#, #UnitCode#, #BarCode#, #ProductNameCN#, #SalePrice#, #CostPrice#, #MemPrice#, #MemPrice2#, #ValidFlag#, #StockFlag#, #isExchanged#,
#SaleFlag#, #StockTakingFlag#, #OrderFlag#, #ReturnFlag#, #Spec#, #Color#,
#ClassCode1#, #ClassName1#, #ClassCode2#, #ClassName2#, #ClassCode3#, #ClassName3#, #ClassCode4#, #ClassName4#, #ClassCode5#, #ClassName5#,
#PuttingTime#, #SynchFlag#, #SynchMsg#, #SynchTime#, GETDATE() )

insert.selectKey:
INSERT INTO Basis.BIN_Product( BIN_OrganizationInfoID, BIN_BrandInfoID, ItemCode, NameTotal, UnitCode,
Status, IsStock, IsExchanged, Mode, Grade, SecQty, DisplayQty,
OriginalBrand, OrderPrice,
SaleFlag, StockTakingFlag, OrderFlag, ReturnFlag,
Spec, Color,
Version,
)VALUES( #organizationInfoId#, #brandInfoId#, #IFProductId#, #ProductNameCN#, #UnitCode#,
#Status#, #StockFlag#, #isExchanged#, #Mode#, #Grade#, #SecQty#, #DisplayQty#,
#OriginalBrand#, #CostPrice#,
#SaleFlag#, #StockTakingFlag#, #OrderFlag#, #ReturnFlag#,
#Spec#, #Color#,
#prtTVersion# + 1,
) select SCOPE_IDENTITY() as value

sqlMap.update:
UPDATE Basis.BIN_Product SET BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId#, BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#, NameTotal = #ProductNameCN#, UnitCode = #UnitCode#,
Status = #Status#, IsStock = #StockFlag#, IsExchanged = #isExchanged#, Mode = #Mode#, Grade = #Grade# , SecQty = #SecQty#, DisplayQty = #DisplayQty#, OriginalBrand = #OriginalBrand#,
Spec = #Spec#, Color = #Color#,
OrderPrice =#CostPrice#, SaleFlag = #SaleFlag#, StockTakingFlag = #StockTakingFlag#, OrderFlag = #OrderFlag#, ReturnFlag = #ReturnFlag#,
ValidFlag = #ValidFlag#, Version = #prtTVersion# + 1,
WHERE BIN_ProductID = #productId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT BIN_ProductPriceID FROM Basis.BIN_ProductPrice WHERE BIN_ProductID = #productId# AND Type = '2' AND SalePrice = #SalePrice#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE Basis.BIN_ProductPrice SET SalePrice = #SalePrice#, MemPrice = #MemPrice#, PlatinumPrice = #MemPrice2#, StartDate = #startDate#,
WHERE BIN_ProductID = #productId# AND Type = '2'
sqlMap.select: SELECT BIN_ProductVendorID AS proVendorId, BarCode AS barCode FROM Basis.BIN_ProductVendor WHERE BIN_ProductID = #productId#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE Basis.BIN_ProductVendor SET
BarCode = #BarCode#,
ValidFlag = 1,
WHERE BIN_ProductVendorID = #prtVendorId#

UPDATE Basis.BIN_PrtBarCode SET UnitCode = #UnitCode#, BarCode = #BarCode#, ValidFlag = '1',
WHERE BIN_ProductVendorID = #prtVendorId# AND ClosingTime IS NULL AND (OldUnitCode != #UnitCode# OR OldBarCode != #BarCode#)

UPDATE Basis.BIN_Product SET ValidFlag = '0', Version = #prtTVersion# + 1,
WHERE BIN_ProductID = #productId# AND ValidFlag='1'

UPDATE Basis.BIN_ProductVendor SET ValidFlag = '0',
WHERE BIN_ProductID = #productId# AND ValidFlag='1'

UPDATE Basis.BIN_PrtBarCode SET ClosingTime = #closingTime#, UpdateFlag = '1', ValidFlag = '1',
WHERE BIN_ProductVendorID = #prtVendorId# AND ClosingTime IS NULL
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO Interfaces.BIN_ProductImportKingdeeBackup( FItemID, FNumber, FBarCode, FFullName, FName,
FNumber1, FName1, FNumber2, FName2, FNumber3, FName3, FNumber4, FName4, FNumber5, FName5,
FSalePrice, FRefCost, FModel, FDeleteD, FSOLowPrc, FKFPeriod, FTaxRate, FModifyTime, FIsStopPDAShopManage,
FilterResult, BackupDate, BusinessDate, BackupPGM ) VALUES( #FItemID#, #FNumber#, #FBarCode#, #FFullName#, #FName#,
#FNumber1#, #FName1#, #FNumber2#, #FName2#, #FNumber3#, #FName3#, #FNumber4#, #FName4#, #FNumber5#, #FName5#,
#FSalePrice#, #FRefCost#, #FModel#, #FDeleteD#, #FSOLowPrc#, #FKFPeriod#, #FTaxRate#, #FModifyTime#, #FIsStopPDAShopManageStr#,
#filterResult#, #createTime#, #businessDate#, #updatePGM# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT BIN_PrtCatPropertyID FROM Basis.BIN_PrtCatProperty WHERE BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND PropertyNameChinese = #propNameCN#
SELECT BIN_PrtCatPropertyID FROM Basis.BIN_PrtCatProperty WHERE BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND TeminalFlag = #teminalFlag#
SELECT BIN_PrtCatPropertyID FROM Basis.BIN_PrtCatProperty WHERE BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND Property = #property#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE Basis.BIN_PrtCatProperty SET TeminalFlag = #teminalFlag#,
WHERE BIN_PrtCatPropertyID = #prtCatPropId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT BIN_PrtCatPropValueID AS propValId FROM Basis.BIN_PrtCatPropValue WHERE BIN_PrtCatPropertyID = #prtCatPropId#
PropValueCherry = #propValueCherry#
PropValue = #propValue#
SELECT BIN_PrtCatPropValueID AS propValId FROM Basis.BIN_PrtCatPropValue WHERE BIN_PrtCatPropertyID = #prtCatPropId# AND PropValueChinese = #propValueCN#

SELECT BIN_PrtCatPropValueID AS propValId FROM Basis.BIN_PrtCatPropValue WHERE BIN_PrtCatPropertyID = #prtCatPropId#
PropValueCherry = #propValueCherry#
PropValue = #propValue#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE Basis.BIN_PrtCatPropValue SET PropValueChinese = #propValueCN#, PropValueForeign = #propValueEN#, ValidFlag = '1',
WHERE BIN_PrtCatPropValueID = #catPropValId#
